languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мы получили трансляцию с Тассеры. Качество связи оставляет желать лучшего, но суть ясна: мир ожидает прибытия Вашей Светлости — по этому случаю устроен грандиозный праздник, а делегация во главе с губернатором готова воздать вам приветственные почести".

"Lord Captain, we have received a vox-cast from Thassera. The signal quality is rather poor, but the meaning is clear: the world is expecting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s arrival. Great festivities have been arranged, and a delegation led by the planetary governor is ready to give you a welcome worthy of an honoured guest."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы получили трансляцию с Тассеры. Качество связи оставляет желать лучшего, но суть ясна: мир ожидает прибытия Вашей Светлости — по этому случаю устроен грандиозный праздник, а делегация во главе с губернатором готова воздать вам приветственные почести".

Great festivities have been arranged, and a delegation led by the planetary governor is ready to give you a welcome worthy of an honoured guest."

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wir haben eine Vox-Nachricht von Thassera erhalten. Das Signal ist ziemlich schlecht, aber die Bedeutung ist klar. Die Welt erwartet die Ankunft Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es wurden große Festlichkeiten arrangiert, und eine Delegation des hiesigen Gouverneurs ist bereit, Euch als Ehrengast zu begrüßen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-cast from Thassera. The signal quality is rather poor, but the meaning is clear: the world is expecting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s arrival. Great festivities have been arranged, and a delegation led by the planetary governor is ready to give you a welcome worthy of an honoured guest."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, wir haben eine Vox-Nachricht von Thassera erhalten. Das Signal ist ziemlich schlecht, aber die Bedeutung ist klar. Die Welt erwartet die Ankunft Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es wurden große Festlichkeiten arrangiert, und eine Delegation des hiesigen Gouverneurs ist bereit, Euch als Ehrengast zu begrüßen."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu une transmission-vox de Thassera. Bien que la qualité du signal laisse à désirer, le message est clair : votre arrivée est attendue avec impatience. Des festivités grandioses ont été organisées et une délégation menée par le gouverneur planétaire est prête à vous offrir un accueil digne d'{mf|un invité|une invitée} d'honneur. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-cast from Thassera. The signal quality is rather poor, but the meaning is clear: the world is expecting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s arrival. Great festivities have been arranged, and a delegation led by the planetary governor is ready to give you a welcome worthy of an honoured guest."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu une transmission-vox de Thassera. Bien que la qualité du signal laisse à désirer, le message est clair : votre arrivée est attendue avec impatience. Des festivités grandioses ont été organisées et une délégation menée par le gouverneur planétaire est prête à vous offrir un accueil digne d'{mf|un invité|une invitée} d'honneur. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们收到了来自塔瑟拉的音阵通讯。尽管信号质量很差，但意思明确无误——整个世界都在等待着您的到来，大人。当地政府为您安排好了盛大的庆典，总督与代表团将会以贵客的规格亲自迎接您的到来。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-cast from Thassera. The signal quality is rather poor, but the meaning is clear: the world is expecting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s arrival. Great festivities have been arranged, and a delegation led by the planetary governor is ready to give you a welcome worthy of an honoured guest."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们收到了来自塔瑟拉的音阵通讯。尽管信号质量很差，但意思明确无误——整个世界都在等待着您的到来，大人。当地政府为您安排好了盛大的庆典，总督与代表团将会以贵客的规格亲自迎接您的到来。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido una transmisión de voco desde Thassera. La calidad de la señal deja mucho que desear, pero el mensaje está claro. El planeta espera la llegada de mi{mf|lord|lady}. Se han organizado grandes festejos y el gobernador ha preparado una delegación para darle la bienvenida que merece tan honorable visitante».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-cast from Thassera. The signal quality is rather poor, but the meaning is clear: the world is expecting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s arrival. Great festivities have been arranged, and a delegation led by the planetary governor is ready to give you a welcome worthy of an honoured guest."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido una transmisión de voco desde Thassera. La calidad de la señal deja mucho que desear, pero el mensaje está claro. El planeta espera la llegada de mi{mf|lord|lady}. Se han organizado grandes festejos y el gobernador ha preparado una delegación para darle la bienvenida que merece tan honorable visitante».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、タッセーラからヴォックスメッセージを受信しました。信号はかなり不安定ですが、内容は明瞭です。惑星は閣下のご到着を心待ちにしており、盛大なお祭りが準備されています。惑星の総督を団長とする代表団が、名誉ある客人にふさわしい歓迎の準備を整えております」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-cast from Thassera. The signal quality is rather poor, but the meaning is clear: the world is expecting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s arrival. Great festivities have been arranged, and a delegation led by the planetary governor is ready to give you a welcome worthy of an honoured guest."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、タッセーラからヴォックスメッセージを受信しました。信号はかなり不安定ですが、内容は明瞭です。惑星は閣下のご到着を心待ちにしており、盛大なお祭りが準備されています。惑星の総督を団長とする代表団が、名誉ある客人にふさわしい歓迎の準備を整えております」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Thassera'dan bir voks yayını aldık. Sinyal kalitesi oldukça düşük olsa da anlamı gayet açık: Dünya, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin gelişini bekliyor. Büyük şenlikler düzenlenmiş ve gezegen valisi önderliğindeki bir heyet, siz onurlu bir misafire yakışır şekilde karşılamaya hazırmış."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-cast from Thassera. The signal quality is rather poor, but the meaning is clear: the world is expecting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s arrival. Great festivities have been arranged, and a delegation led by the planetary governor is ready to give you a welcome worthy of an honoured guest."

Büyük şenlikler düzenlenmiş ve gezegen valisi önderliğindeki bir heyet, siz onurlu bir misafire yakışır şekilde karşılamaya hazırmış."
